parameters.name: NetworkAclId
parameters.description: The ID of the network ACL.

parameters.name: NetworkAclName
parameters.description:
The name of the network ACL.

The name must be 1 to 128 characters in length. The name cannot start with \*\*http:// **or** https://\*\*.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number. Pages start from page **1**. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Maximum value: **50**. Default value: **10**.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: The ID of the associated instance.
